title: hosa hosadAgi kELuvE
sahitya:
hosa hosadAgi kELuvE kanda sikhiyAda mAtaruLu


anupallavi

  beNNE tumbitta mAyin tanaguta melladantE nIvU


caraNam    maneyali mane hiDisuhurilla enna kelasagaLa mareyuvE mAdhava
nI baruvadina habbadanina tappadE haNNu hAlu tuppavella hiTTiruveNuDAlu
				(madhyamakAla)
Irina enna sorinavAdarE nI baruve maDimAtanADuve giri kathegaLa
